channel.title: Users on Agilebase docs
channel.description: Recent content in Users on Agilebase docs

item.title: 2FA setup
item.description: What is two factor authentication? Simply put, it helps to keep your company’s data more secure, to stop outsiders stealing it, editing or even deleting it. When someone logs in from a new device or location, the system will prompt them for a code sent to or generated by their phone, to prove their identity. If you’d like to dive into more detail, check out this video from authy.com: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ds_TANz4n3U&feature=youtu.be

item.title: Community Users
item.description: Agilebase is primarily a platform for building back office systems for employees (or members of the organisation) to use. However, it’s common to allow access to people outside the organisation to perform limited data entry tasks. For example, you may wish your suppliers to be able to upload certificates of conformances to items they sell you, or you may have a large workforce of contractors who you require to fill in timesheets.
